intent_atoms.description: Provide automated parse tree streaming tests for ParseTreeExplorerView on macOS
Allow ParseTreeExplorerView to be initialized with preconstructed outline/detail view models for testing production state wiring
ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests must assert that the outline and detail panes stay synchronized around the default selection during live updates
CLI logging and telemetry toggles (--quiet/--verbose, enable/disable flags) must propagate into ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment and ISOInspectorCommandContext
Global CLI logging and telemetry options must always be available across all command contexts
Introduce a global CLI logging and telemetry toggle system that propagates options to environment and context objects

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests
functional_units.description: Automated tests that host ParseTreeExplorerView, stream parse events, and assert synchronization of outline/detail panes during live updates

functional_units.name: ParseTreeExplorerView initializer with preconstructed view models
functional_units.description: Allows creation of ParseTreeExplorerView using existing outline and detail view models for testing production state wiring

functional_units.name: Global CLI logging toggle (--quiet/--verbose)
functional_units.description: Command-line interface option to control verbosity of logs globally

functional_units.name: Telemetry enable/disable flag
functional_units.description: CLI flag to turn telemetry on or off, propagated into ISOInspectorCLIEnvironment and ISOInspectorCommandContext
